parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Gheorghe Simon, a PSD candidate for the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement targeting a wide audience in Maramureș County and surrounding areas, as evidenced by the ad targeting data. The language used ("Dragii mei vișeuani, dragi maramureșeni") also indicates an attempt to reach a broad audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Gheorghe Simon (PSD) in the parliamentary elections. The call to action is explicit: "Duminică, la alegerile parlamentare, susținem omul nostru, susținem omul locului, susținem vișeuianul nostru-Gheorghe Simon și PSD Maramureș la Camera Deputaților și Senatul României, poziția #2 pe cele două buletine de vot." This directly aims to influence the electoral outcome.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post touches upon general themes of community and unity, its core message is explicitly promotional and partisan, advocating for a specific candidate. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of a candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>465702052796693</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Primária Vișeu de Sus, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a specific candidate (Gheorghe Simon, PSD), targets a wide audience in Maramureș County, has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for Simon and PSD), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The post's timing, close to the election day, further strengthens the case for it being electoral propaganda.  The post's content explicitly encourages voters to support Gheorghe Simon and the PSD. The use of phrases like "omul nostru," "omul locului," and "vișeuianul nostru" creates a sense of local pride and connection, aiming to sway voters emotionally. The inclusion of the candidate's position on the ballot (#2) provides practical voting instructions.  The high reach (70K-80K impressions, 100K-500K reach estimate) and significant spend (RON 1K-1.5K) indicate a deliberate and substantial effort to influence the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Gheorghe Simon</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Primária Vișeu de Sus, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 465702052796693) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă. Postarea, cu un buget de 1000-1500 RON, a atins 70.000-80.000 de impresii și o estimare de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, promovând explicit candidatul Gheorghe Simon (PSD) pentru alegerile parlamentare, indicând poziția sa pe buletinul de vot (#2) și utilizând un limbaj emoțional pentru a influența votul.  Această acțiune contravine prevederilor legale privind încetarea campaniei electorale și interzicerea propagandei electorale după încheierea acesteia.  Contactul este primariaviseu@yahoo.com și +40758142897.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
